data.actual_result: It generates an invite link that points to the channel at the top of the channel list
data.expected_result: It should generate an invite link that points to this channel
data.short_description: Creating an invite by long-pressing on a channel will create an invite for the channel at the top of the list
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server where you have Create invite permissions - Long-press on a channel that isn't at the top of the list- In the long-press menu select "Create invite"
